verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: for some reason] [V: thinks] [ARG1: he 's the most popular president of all time] , but poll numbers prove otherwise . So instead of admitting that he 's the least popular president in history , Trump lies about his poll numbers .
